caption.p: Percentage of germ tube formation by Candida albicans ATCC 10231 incubated with Thapsia villosa essential oil and its main components methyleugenol and limonene. Results are expressed as mean Â± SD of three independent experiments. Statistical differences at * p < 0.05, ** p < 0.01 and **** p < 0.0001 (ANOVA, Tukey HSD multiple comparison test), face to the control.
